====Usage notes====
This is a non-standard variant in Japanese for the character {{m|ja|綿}}.  Note the difference in [[radical]]: {{lang|ja|棉}} has the {{m|ja|木}} or {{m|en|tree}} radical, while {{m|ja|綿}} as the {{m|ja|糸}} or {{m|en|thread}} radical.
